alert.note: Alert for Robertson; Sumner (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 09 at 4:32PM CST until December 09 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN SUMNER AND NORTHEASTERN ROBERTSON COUNTIES... At 431 PM CST, a confirmed large and extremely dangerous tornado was located near Springfield, moving east at 35 mph. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. TAKE COVER NOW! HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Public confirmed tornado. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be destroyed. Considerable damage to homes, businesses, and vehicles is likely and complete destruction is possible. The tornado will be near... White House and Cross Plains around 435 PM CST. Portland around 500 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Mitchellville, Orlinda, and Black Jack. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 105 and 120. TORNADO...OBSERVED TORNADO DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a large, extremely dangerous and potentially deadly tornado is on the ground. To protect your life, TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
